metadata.title: CVE-2020-22570 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Memcached 1.6.0 before 1.6.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (daemon crash) via a crafted meta command.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-22570` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

memcached - 1.6.14-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: memcached package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.14-1').
